phase3.color.HSLColor



class HSLColor;
This is a color represtend by a hue, saturation, and lightness value.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 9, 2014

this();
Creates an HSLColor with the hue, saturation, and lightness values set to 0.

Date:
April 9, 2014

this(uint hue, real saturation, real lightness);
Creates an HSLColor.

Params:
uint hue The hue value.
real saturation The saturation value.
real lightness The lightness value.

Date:
April 9, 2014

RGBColor toRGBColor();
Converts this HSLColor to an RGBColor.

See Also:
Converting Between HSL & RGB

Date:
April 9, 2014

Color toSWTColor(Device device);
Converts this HSLColor into a Color usable by the SWT library.

Params:
Device device The main Display's Device.

Returns:
An SWT Color.

Date:
April 10, 2014
